onboardingText2: Got a problem? Talk to GemiChat...
onboardingText3: Don't worry. Your account is safe
onboardingSubtext1: GemiChat bot will become your smartest friend during this period.
onboardingSubtext2: GemiChat bot has all your needs covered with various features.
onboardingSubtext3: Your safety is ours. But for this you need to set a good password.
signInHint: Please enter your email and password to sign in.
redirectToHomePageMessage: You will be redirected to home page shortly.
resetPasswordHint: To reset your password you will need the next clear OTP code sent to your email.
otpCodeVerificationHint: Please check your email address and enter the OTP code you received here.
createNewPasswordHint: Your password should be difficult and not known to other people.
createAccountHint: Please enter your email and password to sign up.
confirmToPolicy: I agree to GemiChat bot Terms & Policy.
setYourPINCodeHint: Add a PIN to make your account more secure.
youAreReadyHint: Your account is ready. Let's start for your better chatting experience.
startChatHint: You should start asking us everything that interests you!
title: Title
areYouSureToSignout: Are you sure to sign out?
areYouSureToDeleteHint: If you delete it all your correspondence will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
enterSamePasswordsAlert: You must enter the same passwords.
historyIsEmptyHint: Start a new correspondence and send us questions.
agreeToPolicyAlertMessage: You have to approve Terms & Policy to continue.
timeToSetSomeUserPrefs: Now, time to make your profile looks shine!
